toastMessage.memoWishListDeleted: Memo has been removed from wish list.
toastMessage.memoWishListAdded: Memo has been added to wish list.

login.welcomeDescription: Web Memo where you can write memos conveniently.
login.askGoInstallExtension: You haven't installed the extension. You need to install it to use the memo feature. Would you like to go install it?
login.personalInformationInfo: We value your privacy. Your personal data is securely stored and will never be shared with third parties. We do not send marketing or spam messages.
